summary: A small mod that adds magic bags that increase your carrying capacity. Can be crafted at a forge.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#3d85c6][b][u][size=6]Magic Bags of Souls[/size][/u][/b][/color]


[u][b][size=5]About this Mod:[/size][/b][/u]
[size=4]
This mod adds [color=#00ff00]6 magic bags[/color] that increase the carrying capacity of the wearer. Each bag can be crafted at any forge under the [color=#00ff00]Misc[/color] category. These bags fill no slots and can all be worn at once without removing any other items that player has on. These bags are invisible when worn.
[/size]

[color=#ffff00][u][b][size=5]The Bags:[/size][/b][/u][/color]

[size=4]Magic Bag - [color=#6fa8dc]Petty[/color] [/size]- Increases carrying capacity by 40.
[i][b]Ingredients [/b][/i]- 3 Leather, 10 Petty Soul Gems(Filled), 5 Leather Strips

[size=4]Magic Bag - [color=#6fa8dc]Lesser[/color] [/size]- Increases carrying capacity by 80.
[i][b]Ingredients [/b][/i]- 3 Leather, 10 Lesser Soul Gems(Filled), 5 Leather Strips

[size=4]Magic Bag - [color=#6fa8dc]Common[/color] [/size]- Increases carrying capacity by 160.
[i][b]Ingredients [/b][/i]- 3 Leather, 10 Common Soul Gems(Filled), 5 Leather Strips

[size=4]Magic Bag - [color=#6fa8dc]Greater[/color] [/size]- Increases carrying capacity by 250.
[i][b]Ingredients [/b][/i]- 3 Leather, 10 Greater Soul Gems(Filled), 5 Leather Strips

[size=4]Magic Bag - [color=#6fa8dc]Grand[/color] [/size]- Increases carrying capacity by 450.
[i][b]Ingredients [/b][/i]- 3 Leather, 10 Grand Soul Gems(Filled), 5 Leather Strips

[size=4]Magic Bag - [color=#6fa8dc]Black[/color] [/size]- Increases carrying capacity by 600.
[i][b]Ingredients [/b][/i]- 3 Leather, 10 Black Soul Gems(Filled), 5 Leather Strips


[size=4][color=#8e7cc3][u][b]Lore/Background:[/b][/u][/color]

After trial and error, the ability to merge captive souls into "bags" have been discovered. These magic bags give the wearer strength. The larger the souls, the more strength the wearer recieves. With the right ingredients and the right number of collected souls, these "Magic Bags" can be crafted with no Enchanting skills or practices required. As long as one has basic knowlegde of crafting at a forge, they can easily create their own bags.[/size]


[u][b][size=4]Other Information:[/size][/b][/u]
[size=4]
I know that this mod will not be for everyone and some may even consider it cheaty. I attempted to make it as lore friendly as possible. Therefore a player at level one would be unable to make even the Petty bag without using cheats for gold and items. These bags, while simple enough to craft, are expensive and should take time to make if you are just starting out.[/size]


[size=4][color=#ffff00][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/color]

Install using your favorite mod manager. Or simply drag and drop the esp file into your Skyrim Data Folder

[color=#ff0000][u][b]Requirements:[/b][/u][/color]

Only Skyrim up-to-date.

[/size]My Other Mods:
